Program: Modernization program for public property registries and cadastres
Additional Details: Property rights, inheritance, control of land and other assets
SDG Description: End poverty in all its forms everywhere
SDG Target Description: By 2030, ensure that all men and women, in particular the poor and the vulnerable, have equal rights to economic resources, as well as access to basic services, ownership and control over land and other forms of property, inheritance, natural resources, appropriate new technology and financial services, including microfinance
SDG Indicator Description: Proportion of total adult population with secure tenure rights to land, with legally recognized documentation

Program: Ordering and regulation of rural property
SDG Description: End poverty in all its forms everywhere
SDG Target Description: By 2030, ensure that all men and women, in particular the poor and the vulnerable, have equal rights to economic resources, as well as access to basic services, ownership and control over land and other forms of property, inheritance, natural resources, appropriate new technology and financial services, including microfinance
SDG Indicator Description: Proportion of total adult population with secure tenure rights to land, who perceive their rights to land as secure

Program: Agriculture promotion program
SDG Description: End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture
SDG Target Description: By 2030, ensure sustainable food production systems and implement resilient agricultural practices that increase productivity and production, that help maintain ecosystems, that strengthen capacity for adaptation to climate change, extreme weather, drought, flooding and other disasters and that progressively improve land and soil quality
SDG Indicator Description: Proportion of agricultural area under productive and sustainable agriculture

Program: Livestock development program
SDG Description: End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture
SDG Target Description: By 2030, ensure sustainable food production systems and implement resilient agricultural practices that increase productivity and production, that help maintain ecosystems, that strengthen capacity for adaptation to climate change, extreme weather, drought, flooding and other disasters and that progressively improve land and soil quality
SDG Indicator Description: Proportion of agricultural area under productive and sustainable agriculture

Category: Planning, monitoring and evaluation of public policies
Program: Prevention and care of HIV/AIDS and other STIs
SDG Description: Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages
SDG Target Description: By 2030, end the epidemics of AIDS, tuberculosis, malaria and neglected tropical diseases and combat hepatitis, water-borne diseases and other communicable diseases
SDG Indicator Description: Number of new HIV infections per 1,000 uninfected population

Program: Prevention and care against addictions
SDG Description: Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages
SDG Target Description: Strengthen the prevention and treatment of substance abuse, including narcotic drug abuse and harmful use of alcohol
SDG Indicator Description: Coverage of treatment interventions (pharmacological, psychosocial and rehabilitation and aftercare services) for substance use disorders

Program: Physical culture and sports program
SDG Description: Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages
SDG Target Description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being
SDG Indicator Description: Mortality rate attributed to cardiovascular disease, cancer, diabetes or chronic respiratory disease

Program: Expansion of higher secondary and higher education
SDG Description: Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all
SDG Target Description: By 2030, ensure equal access for all women and men to affordable and quality technical, vocational and tertiary education, including university
SDG Indicator Description: Participation rate of youth and adults in formal and non-formal education and training in the previous 12 months

Program: National English Program
SDG Description: Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all
SDG Target Description: By 2030, substantially increase the supply of qualified teachers, including through international cooperation for teacher training in developing countries, especially least developed countries and small island developing States
SDG Indicator Description: Proportion of teachers with the minimum required qualifications

Program: Promote care and prevention of violence against women
SDG Description: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
SDG Target Description: Eliminate all forms of violence against all women and girls in the public and private spheres, including trafficking and sexual and other types of exploitation
SDG Indicator Description: Proportion of women and girls aged 15 years and older subjected to sexual violence by persons other than an intimate partner in the previous 12 months

Program: Gender equality policies in the educational sector
SDG Description: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
SDG Target Description: Ensure universal access to sexual and reproductive health and reproductive rights as agreed in accordance with the Programme of Action of the International Conference on Population and Development and the Beijing Platform for Action and the outcome documents of their review conferences
SDG Indicator Description: Proportion of women aged 15–49 years who make their own informed decisions regarding sexual relations, contraceptive use and reproductive health care

Program: Operation and maintenance of water infrastructure
SDG Description: Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all
SDG Target Description: By 2030, achieve universal and equitable access to safe and affordable drinking water for all
SDG Indicator Description: Proportion of population using safely managed drinking water services

Program: Comprehensive and sustainable water management
SDG Description: Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all
SDG Target Description: By 2030, achieve access to adequate and equitable sanitation and hygiene for all and end open defecation, paying special attention to the needs of women and girls and those in vulnerable situations
SDG Indicator Description: Proportion of population using safely managed sanitation services

Program: Electricity rate subsidies
SDG Description: Ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable and modern energy for all
SDG Target Description: By 2030, ensure universal access to affordable, reliable and modern energy services
SDG Indicator Description: Proportion of population with access to electricity

Program: Promotion of measures for the saving and efficient use of electrical energy
SDG Description: Ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable and modern energy for all
SDG Target Description: By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency
SDG Indicator Description: Energy intensity measured in terms of primary energy and GDP

Program: Labor justice enforcement
SDG Description: Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment and decent work for all
SDG Target Description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment
SDG Indicator Description: Level of national compliance with labour rights (freedom of association and collective bargaining) based on International Labour Organization (ILO) textual sources and national legislation

Program: Program for the development of the software industry and innovation
SDG Description: Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment and decent work for all
SDG Target Description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors
SDG Indicator Description: Annual growth rate of real GDP per employed person

Program: Employment support program
SDG Description: Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment and decent work for all
SDG Target Description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value
SDG Indicator Description: Unemployment rate

Program: Sectoral strengthening of scientific, technological and innovation capabilities
SDG Description: Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation
SDG Target Description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries
SDG Indicator Description: Manufacturing employment as a proportion of total employment

Program: Program for industrial productivity and competitiveness
SDG Description: Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation
SDG Target Description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries
SDG Indicator Description: Manufacturing value added as a proportion of GDP and per capita

Program: Strengthening the bank savings protection system
SDG Description: Reduce inequality within and among countries
SDG Target Description: Improve the regulation and monitoring of global financial markets and institutions and strengthen the implementation of such regulations
SDG Indicator Description: Financial Soundness Indicators

Program: Program for the constitution of priority territorial reserves for orderly urban development
Additional Details: Adequate, safe and affordable housing and services
SDG Description: Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable
SDG Target Description: By 2030, ensure access for all to adequate, safe and affordable housing and basic services and upgrade slums
SDG Indicator Description: Proportion of urban population living in slums, informal settlements or inadequate housing

Program: Urban Improvement Program
SDG Description: Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable
SDG Target Description: By 2030, ensure access for all to adequate, safe and affordable housing and basic services and upgrade slums
SDG Indicator Description: Proportion of urban population living in slums, informal settlements or inadequate housing

Program: Air quality and vehicle verification programs
SDG Description: Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable
SDG Target Description: By 2030, reduce the adverse per capita environmental impact of cities, including by paying special attention to air quality and municipal and other waste management
SDG Indicator Description: Annual mean levels of fine particulate matter

Program: Development and promotion of sustainable tourism projects
SDG Description: Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns
SDG Target Description: Develop and implement tools to monitor sustainable development impacts for sustainable tourism that creates jobs and promotes local culture and products
SDG Indicator Description: Implementation of standard accounting tools to monitor the economic and environmental aspects of tourism sustainability

Program: Natural Disasters Fund
SDG Description: Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts
SDG Target Description: Strengthen resilience and adaptive capacity to climate-related hazards and natural disasters in all countries
SDG Indicator Description: Number of deaths, missing persons and directly affected persons attributed to disasters per 100,000 population

Category: Planning, monitoring and evaluation of public policies
Program: Assessment of the National Climate Change Policy
SDG Description: Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts
SDG Target Description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning
SDG Indicator Description: Total greenhouse gas emissions per year

Program: National system of protected natural areas
SDG Description: Conserve and sustainably use the oceans, seas and marine resources for sustainable development
SDG Target Description: Minimize and address the impacts of ocean acidification, including through enhanced scientific cooperation at all levels
SDG Indicator Description: Average marine acidity (pH) measured at agreed suite of representative sampling stations

Program: Conservation program for sustainable development
Additional Details: Pollution from activities carried out on land
SDG Description: Conserve and sustainably use the oceans, seas and marine resources for sustainable development
SDG Target Description: By 2025, prevent and significantly reduce marine pollution of all kinds, in particular from land-based activities, including marine debris and nutrient pollution
SDG Indicator Description: Plastic debris density

Program: Environmental regulations and instruments for sustainable development
SDG Description: Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity loss
SDG Target Description: By 2030, combat desertification, restore degraded land and soil, including land affected by desertification, drought and floods, and strive to achieve a land degradation-neutral world
SDG Indicator Description: Proportion of land that is degraded over total land area

Program: Support for sustainable forest development
SDG Description: Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity loss
SDG Target Description: By 2030, combat desertification, restore degraded land and soil, including land affected by desertification, drought and floods, and strive to achieve a land degradation-neutral world
SDG Indicator Description: Proportion of land that is degraded over total land area

Category: Support for public service and management improvement
Program: Activities to support public service and good governance
SDG Description: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
SDG Target Description: Develop effective, accountable and transparent institutions at all levels
SDG Indicator Description: Proportion of population satisfied with their last experience of public services

Program: Strengthening the military intelligence system
SDG Description: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
SDG Target Description: By 2030, significantly reduce illicit financial and arms flows, strengthen the recovery and return of stolen assets and combat all forms of organized crime
SDG Indicator Description: Total value of inward and outward illicit financial flows

Program: Indigenous rights program
SDG Description: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
SDG Target Description: Promote the rule of law at the national and international levels and ensure equal access to justice for all
SDG Indicator Description: Proportion of victims of violence in the previous 12 months who reported their victimization to competent authorities or other officially recognized conflict resolution mechanisms

Category: Planning, monitoring and evaluation of public policies
Program: Design and conduct of public spending policy
SDG Description: Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development
SDG Target Description: Encourage and promote effective public, public-private and civil society partnerships, building on the experience and resourcing strategies of partnerships
SDG Indicator Description: Amount in US dollars committed to public-private partnerships for infrastructure
